title: [Large-Scale] Comparative Research Project on Planning Methods and Reward Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic legal concepts and understanding of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Learners Cultivate Problem-Solving Skills by Comparing National Planning Laws and Compensation Rights Cases Through Case Studies, with Emphasis on Digital Tool-Based Collaboration and Data Collection

learning_goals: Can compare urban planning systems of three or more countries and explain key differences
Can analyze two or more approaches to compensation rights related to land value fluctuations caused by planning decisions
Can write policy proposals applicable to hypothetical scenarios based on comparative research findings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
